LanguageData.BAW_Hina.label: The End: Destroyer
LanguageData.BAW_Hina.description: Hina's machine gun that she utilizes as if it were one of her own limbs.\n\nThose who violate school rules or disturb public morals will be blown away by its merciless destructive power.
LanguageData.BAW_Hina.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Hina.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Hina.label: Bullet of The End: Destroyer
LanguageData.BAW_Iori.label: Crack Shot
LanguageData.BAW_Iori.description: The sniper rifle used by Iori when dealing with problems caused by rulebreakers.\n\nDespite being a simple model without even a scope, according to Iori "a specialist doesn't choose their tools".
LanguageData.BAW_Iori.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Iori.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Iori.label: Bullet of Crack Shot
LanguageData.BAW_Ako.label: Hotshot
LanguageData.BAW_Ako.description: A pistol carried by Ako.\n\nIt is a treasured object that was handed to Ako when she got appointed to the position of executive officer in recognition of her painstaking efforts. Ako carries it with her all the time and takes very good care of it.
LanguageData.BAW_Ako.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Ako.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Ako.label: Bullet of HotShot
LanguageData.BAW_Chinatsu.label: Support Pointer
LanguageData.BAW_Chinatsu.description: Chinatsu's treasured pistol.\n\nIt seems to mostly be used for pointing at things while commanding others, rather than shooting someone.
LanguageData.BAW_Chinatsu.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Chinatsu.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Chinatsu.label: Bullet of Support Pointer
LanguageData.BAW_Mutsuki.label: Trick or Trick
LanguageData.BAW_Mutsuki.description: A machine gun that Mutsuki always carries with her.\n\nAccording to Mutsuki, firepower is an important component of fun pranks.
LanguageData.BAW_Mutsuki.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Mutsuki.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Mutsuki.label: Bullet of Trick or Trick
LanguageData.BAW_Aru.label: Wine-red Admire
LanguageData.BAW_Aru.description: Aru's antique-style sniper rifle that she always takes care of.\n\nJust by carrying it, her hard-boiledness increases...or so it seems.
LanguageData.BAW_Aru.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Aru.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Aru.label: Bullet of Wine-red Admire
LanguageData.BAW_Kayoko.label: Demon's Roar
LanguageData.BAW_Kayoko.description: A handgun that Kayoko usually carries.\n\nAs the name implies, it makes a loud roaring noise every time it is fired, so Kayoko had a silencer added to it.
LanguageData.BAW_Kayoko.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Kayoko.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Kayoko.label: Bullet of Demon's Roar
LanguageData.BAW_Haruka.label: Blow Away
LanguageData.BAW_Haruka.description: A shotgun used by Haruka to exterminate pests.\n\nThe definition of "pest" seems to be on a case-by-case basis.
LanguageData.BAW_Haruka.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BAW_Haruka.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BA_Haruka.label: Bullet of Blow Away
